snippet: Dynamics Inc., a New York-based start-up, has been manufacturing "smarter" credit cards that are actually flexible computer displays, which add multiple payment functions or security features to each card.
abstract: Dynamics Inc., a New York-based start-up, has been manufacturing "smarter" credit cards that are actually flexible computer displays, which add multiple payment functions or security features to each card.
lead_paragraph: LAS VEGAS - Miniature, flexible computers can act as credit cards that offer more control over payments.

headline.main: Flexible Computers Make Smarter Credit Cards
